name: Tapiture
description: Discover & Buy The Best Stuff Online
overview:
Helping Guys Discover, Share & Buy The Best Of Everything Online

Tapiture is a social commerce network that uses behavioral and demographic data to help men discover and purchase products of interest. It seamlessly integrates shopping into a very visual and social environment that mixes shopping and entertainment.

Similar to Pinterest’s “Pin it” button or Facebook’s “Like,” Members “Tap” images they want to share on Tapiture.

Members organize their images in collections and describe the product/image they are sharing. Products are detected and parsed, then a Buy button is displayed for easy purchase.

Tapiture Tastemakers also act as buyers and curate the best content. Whether someone is looking for a new style, the best tech gadgets, or a fun gift idea, they’ll find it on Tapiture.
